problem: Resource allocation problem: 5 machines, 3 software licenses
reasoning: Using QF_UF with constraints on machine availability and license usage.
program:
(set-logic QF_UF
  (declare-const machines 5)
  (declare-const software_licenses 3)
  (assert (forall x (>= 0) (forall y (<= 4) (
    (forall z (<= 1) (not (
      (and (machine-x = x) (software-license-y = y))
      (or (machine-z = z) (software-license-z = z)))
      (or (
        machine-z = 0) (software-license-z = 0)
        (or (
          machine-z = 1) (and (not (machine-x = x)) (software-license-y = y)))
        (or (
          machine-z = 2) (and (not (machine-x = x)) (software-license-z = z))
          (or (
            machine-z = 3) (and (not (machine-x = x)) (software_license_y = y)))
      )))))
  ),
  (assert (for-all m1 m2 machines)
    (forall s1 s2 software_licenses
      (assert (< s1 + s2 5)
       (assert (> s1 - s2 0)))))
)

// Define the problem using QF_UF and QF_LIA
set-logic QF_UF
set-logic QF_LIA
declare-symbols
  x 
  y 
  z 
  w 
  p1 
  p2 
  p3 
  p4 
  p5 
  p6 
  p7
assert (
  x > 0,
  y > 0,
  z > 0,
  w > 0,
  p1 <= x + y + z + w <= 10,
  p2 <= x + y + z + w <= 20,
  p3 <= x + y + z + w <= 30,
  p4 <= x + y + z + w <= 40,
  p5 <= x + y + z + w <= 50,
  p6 <= x + y + z + w <= 60,
  p7 <= x + y + z + w <= 70
)
check-sat

problem: Resource allocation problem: assigning 10 units of CPU to process 1 and 5 units to process 2
reasoning: Use QF_UF and QF_LIA constraints to model the resource allocation problem. Ensure that the total number of units allocated is exactly 15.
program:
set-logic QF_UF
set-logic QF_LIA
declare-const cpu_units: Int
assert (cpu_units = 10)
assert (cpu_units + cpu_units = 15)

problem: Resource allocation problem: 5 agents, each with capacity 2 and deadline 10
reasoning: Use QF_UF and QF_LIA rules to prove existence of a solution that satisfies all constraints
program:
(
  (set-logic QF_UF)
  (declare-const agents 
    (int))
  (assert (
    agents 
      (forall 
        (agent i) 
          (set-logic QF_LIA) 
          (assert (<= 2 (card (agent i))) && 
            (assert (>= 0 (duration (agent i))))))
  )
(
  (declare-const deadline agents 
    (int))
  (assert (
    deadline 
      (forall 
        (agent i) 
          (assert (<= 10 (duration (agent i)))))
    ))
  )
(
  (declare-const capacity agents 
    (int))
  (assert (
    capacity 
      (forall 
        (agent i) 
          (assert (>= 0 (capacity (agent i)))) && 
          (assert (<= 2 (capacity (agent i)))))
    ))
(
  (declare-const agent i 
   (int))
  (assert (
    agent 
      (forall 
        (x : agents) 
          (assert (card (x, i)) = 1))
    ))
)
